source_item.name: Lesser Rune of the Void Ritual

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +0.15% Critical Effect per unique Algari gem color

effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 427,119 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 197,158.
Set: Casting Renewing Mist applies Insurance! for 6 sec. The healing of Insurance! is increased by up to 50% in proportion to the coverage Renewing Mist has on you and up to 10 allies.

name: Faded Championship Ring
description: 'I got one more in me' - Unknown

spells.description:
Equip: Your healing spells and abilities have a chance to summon Mister Pick-Me-Up for 6 sec, firing a healing beam every 2 sec that jumps between 5 injured allies to restore 103,924 health each.

Overhealing from this effect irradiates allies to deal Nature damage to nearby enemies over 1.5 sec, increased by additional overhealing.
Use: Carve a wax copy of your target, which absorbs 50% of their damage taken. The absorption heats up the wax, causing it to melt after absorbing 3.7 million damage. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)
Equip: Your gear cools with Woven Duskthread and gains 756 Versatility when over 80% health.

name: Blastfurious Machete
description: The word 'Family' is etched into its hilt.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Sheilun, Staff of the Mists

spells.description: Equip: You champion the causes of your guild.  All guild reputation gains are increased by 100%.
